description:
Software Resources has an immediate job opportunity for a Partnerships Marketing Coordinator with a major corporation in Glendale, CA.

This assignment is Onsite Mon-Thurs in Glendale, CA., and Remote on Fridays. There are 2 office locations (Glendale & Burbank) and you will be asked to attend a meeting at either location and will be notified ahead of time.

Duration : 13 month(s)

Pay Rate: $29 – $31/hr DOE

Must Haves : Proficiency in Google Suite, creating presentations, great Communication skills, willing to learn, manages time wisely and able to continually meet deadlines.

Description

The Partnerships and Integrated Marketing team is seeking a detail-oriented, organized and collaborative individual for the position of Partnerships Marketing Coordinator. This role will work with strategic external partners as well as internal teams throughout The Company to develop and execute high-impact marketing programs that drive customer acquisition, retention and awareness of Streaming.

This person will be responsible for supporting the go-to-market strategy of Streaming strategic and loyalty partnerships by aiding partner Account Leads in the overall partner launch readiness, owning approvals and overseeing communications and information flow to key internal and external stakeholders. The ideal candidate will have a passion for innovation and storytelling, strong organizational and project management skills, and a strong sense of teamwork and cultivating meaningful relationships at all levels of the organization.

  • Advance partner relationships by overseeing day to day communications and project management.
  • Assist in overall program management for Streaming Perks partnerships. Streaming Perks and 3rd party offers and benefits available to Streaming subscribers.
  • Support larger Streaming strategic portfolio on meeting coordination and approvals, as needed.
  • Lead on partner and company owned marketing assets and creative approvals.
  • Support coordination of information flow of internal and partner marketing channels to key stakeholders.
  • Create tools and processes to effectively manage partner deliverables and statuses.
  • Develop presentations and memos about partnership statuses and larger strategic projects.

Basic Qualifications

  • 1-2 years of experience in marketing or partnerships for an entertainment or tech company
  • Proven experience: ○ Demonstrated program management skills within a matrixed organization with numerous stakeholders ○ Time management and ability to meet expectations under time-sensitive deadlines ○ Excellent communication skills with ability to develop clear and concise reports, presentations and memos for various audiences ○ Adaptability and flexibility to thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced and project-oriented environment, while meeting overall goals and deadlines ○ Self-motivated and proactive learner and performer
  • Expectations ○ Team and goal-oriented; ability to maneuver a dynamic and matrixed environment ○ Coordinate communications, meetings and partner statuses ○ Strong presentation and communication skills; detail oriented ○ Forward thinker who anticipates needs and opportunities ○ Proficiency in Google Suite (Google Docs, Sheets, Slides), Keynote, and PowerPoint ○ Commitment to excellence and integrity

Preferred Qualifications

Use of MAC

Required Education

Bachelor's degree required

Don't delay. Join the Software Resources team today!

Software Resources specializes in connecting talented IT professionals with challenging job opportunities that transform jobs into careers.

To meet our clients' hiring needs, we continuously source talented IT Professionals with all levels of expertise and in all disciplines. We offer world class major medical, dental and vision benefits, 401(k) with match, short term disability, Life Insurance and AD&D. You, our future employees, can make a tremendous difference to our company and our clients. Please apply to this job and experience the Software Resources difference. You can view all of our jobs at https://www.softwareresources.com/careers/

ALERT: Spoofing Scam Advisory

Software Resources has been targeted by spoofing attacks. Scammers impersonating our employees may contact you with fake job offers, asking for personal information. Unfortunately, we cannot completely prevent these fraudulent activities.

Stay Protected: Verify any communication claiming to be from Software Resources. For your safety, directly confirm the legitimacy of any job offer or inquiry by calling us at 407-515-6020. Do not respond to unsolicited requests without verification.

We value our integrity and urge you not to fall victim to these scams. Always verify by calling us directly at 407-515-6020.
